data.name: Mirrored Soul Demo
data.detailed_description: Mirrored Soul is a monster-collecting RPG for people who are sick of monster-collecting RPGs. Traverse dimensions, recruit monsters or shake 'em down for information, take down the armies of the shadowy Mirrorlord -- and maybe do some sleuthing here and there. Enjoy the demo!
data.about_the_game: Mirrored Soul is a monster-collecting RPG for people who are sick of monster-collecting RPGs. Traverse dimensions, recruit monsters or shake 'em down for information, take down the armies of the shadowy Mirrorlord -- and maybe do some sleuthing here and there. Enjoy the demo!
data.short_description: A turn-based detective RPG with focus on monster-collecting and exploration. Negotiate with enemies to recruit them to your party, and fuse your monsters to create new ones.
